issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
When I try to build app importing ti.admob, build fails.

I have tried to recompile it but I'm not enable to do it. Someone can help me?

[ERROR] :  ** BUILD FAILED **
[ERROR] :  The following build commands failed:
[ERROR] :  	Ld build/Products/Debug-iphonesimulator/Project/Project normal x86_64
[ERROR] :  (1 failure)
fields.summary: App project with 7.0.1 SDK, iOS build fail using ti.admob

comments.body: Ti.AdMob was recently updated to 2.2.0 that uses the latest AdMob SDK 7.27.0 and it builds fine. More on the [Github repository|https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.admob/releases].

Oh, thank you, very efficient support!

Best regards
